TextView.android:text: Call code Blue (Method:PA, Cell Phone,or Radio)
Arrival of 1st responder (less than 60s) Verbalizes that the scene is safe.
Yells for help. Tell someone to phone 911 and get an AED
Checks for no breathing or only gasping (Minimum 5s; Maximum 10s)
Bares vicitm's chest and locates hand position
Delivers first set of compressions (30 compressions in 15 to 18 seconds)
AED arrives (less than 90s). Turns AED on.
Selects proper AED pads and place pads correctly
Clears victim to analyze (visible and verbal check)
Deliver second set of compressions (at least 23 out of 30 in the correct chest location)
Leave pads attached (until EMS tells you otherwise)
Save and continue to AED inspection
